title: Savory Croissants Are Going Way Beyond Ham and Cheese
summary: The Houston bakery Shakkar serves croissants that are basically meals, like a steak frites croissant | Photo by Maham Qureshi For me, the light bulb moment was the steak frites croissant. I was scrolling Instagram when the golden brown pastry popped onto my phone screen, a hunk of steak poking out â€¦
